description:
OVERVIEW

While stuck in a routine, a random person online liked the photo you posted and sent you a friend request. After accepting it, an online friendship begins. A short visual novel that revolves around doing tasks and chatting with someone in the span of 7 days!

FEATURES
  • Messenger-like story progression
  • Tasks to proceed with the day
  • Some responses based on choices
  • Supported a friend in just 7 days!
  • Singular ending

Warning! Contains shaking of the screen, repetitive actions, and some foul language.

NOTE

This is my first ever work. I'm still trying out Ren'Py and see what it can do. I hope you'll enjoy this quick and simple story.

Art / Story by peridon

Music and SFX from bensmir, freesound.org
